Mon: %Edmund: There's many mysteries in the world. We've barely scratched the surface.
Tue: %Edmund: Brianna and Drake started dating recently.#$e#%Edmund: I totally called it.
Wed: %Edmund: I saw a mermaid once. She had perfect skin and beautiful blue hair...
Thu: %Edmund: I applied to live in Castle Village. I hope my cover letter convinces Camilla.#$e#%Edmund: The success rate is low. Like... 25 percent. Crazy right?
Fri: %Edmund: Hey, good to see you.#$e#%Edmund: I plan my leg day workouts to coincide with patrol duty. Ain't I bright?
Sat: %Edmund: We found another ocean cavern filled with monsters.#$e#%Edmund: *sigh* Now it's our problem.
Sun: %Edmund: You run around with such determination...#$e#%Edmund: I can't figure you out.
